constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 163 (Friday, October 14, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KHANNA:
H.R. 9181.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the Constitution gives Congress the
power to make laws that are necessary and proper to carry out
its enumerated powers.
[Page H8396]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

title: To provide for a temporary 1-year halt to all proposed direct commercial sales and foreign military sales to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia of weaponry and munitions.
